mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (user_name, password, real_name, phone, role_id, avatar, create_time, create_by) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{realname}, #{phone}, #{roleId}, #{avatar}, NOW(), #{createBy})
mapper.update: update sys_user set real_name=#{realname}, phone=#{phone}, role_id=#{roleId}, update_time=NOW(), update_by=#{updateBy} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from sys_user where del_flag=0 and user_name=#{userName} limit 1
select * from sys_user where del_flag=0 and phone=#{phone} limit 1
